import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Booking.css' import { Button, Form , FormGroup , ListGroup ,ListGroupItem } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour; const [credential,setCredential] = useState({ userId : '01', userEmail : 'sajal@gmail.com', fullName :'', phone : '', guestSize :'', bookAt : '', date: '', }) const handleChange = e => { setCredential(prev=>({...prev,[e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const ServiceFee =10 const totalamount = Number(price)*Number(credential.guestSize)+Number(ServiceFee); const handleClick =e=> { e.preventDefault() console.log(credential) } return (

${price} /per person

{avgRating===0?null:avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
Infromation
${price} 1 Person
${price}
Service Charged
${ServiceFee}
Total Price
${totalamount}
) } export default Booking
